summary: Fatsale is a decentralized presale platform - Fatsale enables users to create their own token within minutes and list it on decentralized exchanges for trading. It also provides a series of commonly used features in the encrypted world to assist users in building their own token ecosystem.
proposal:
Hello Fatsale community,

Hope you're all having a token-tastic day! 🚀

We've been marveling at your project from afar and couldn't help but notice how your vision aligns with ours. Just like Fatsale enables users to create their own tokens and list them on DEXs, we too, are in the business of empowering communities with B2B tools. 

We're not here to sell you lottery tickets or DEXs, we're here to offer you the tools to create your own. With our suite of B2B tools, you can create your own DEX, run a blockchain-based lottery, establish a multicurrency crypto wallet, set up ERC20 Staking & Yield Farming, and much more. And the best part? It's all customizable, from colors and logos to fees and token lists.

So, why not add a few more tools to your already impressive Fatsale toolbox? With our tools, you can take your project to new heights, without breaking a sweat or your bank account. 

Interested in taking a peek at what we have to offer? Check out our demos here: https://t.me/onoutdemos 

Remember, with us, you're not just playing the game, you're creating it. Let's create something amazing together! 👋

P.S. Our humor might be a bit dry, but our tools are definitely not. 😉
